text: i used to work in building across the street. holler if you need extras, i can make it happen.

Hey all,

Video progress is tracking really well.  However, today we agreed to a tweak in the strategic approach to our written pieces and thus the program of information.  TL;DR
- We’re pencils down on Justin’s draft of online case study.  We’ll pick it back up once we have a cut of the video.
- Justin, Megan and Joel are working on drafts of Blog posts.  Let’s progress here but drafts won’t be shared out until we’ve evaluated them in context with the Case Study draft and Video edit
- That means that all pieces will go to Google as a bundle once we have a video edit (likely, later this month)
- When we pick everything back up later this month *we’ll require a single owner/editor* <@U0914MEN7> or <@U0265G76F>  to own and help edit all the pieces down into a cohesive vision.  Justin, Megan or I can own the follow through from there.  

For now, I’ll be sharing an update with Alana to prime her expectations (but not create a firedrill or be overly committal for us) AND I’ll be seeking her approval on photos so we can keep that stream moving.  Hit me with any questions.
